amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to transfer $14.3 million from the Peace Corps budget to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to redirect $14.3 million from the Peace Corps budget and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 295 (Roll no. 470).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 295 (Roll no. 470).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
